OUTLINE : This multicenter study . Patients stratify base gender level nicotine dependence . Patients randomize 1 3 intervention arm . At baseline , patient receive minimal behavioral intervention use 3-minute , simple smoke cessation counseling strategy , self-help manual , telephone quit-line number . - Arm I ( varenicline ) : Patients receive oral varenicline daily day 1-3 twice daily thereafter total 6 month comfortable level smoking abstinence reach . - Arm II ( placebo ) : Patients receive oral varenicline placebo daily day 1-3 twice daily thereafter total 6 month comfortable level smoking abstinence reach . - Arm III ( nicotine patch/gum ) : Patients receive nicotine patch , dose taper time total 26 week . Patients also receive nicotine gum quell breakthrough urge . Patients may stop treatment comfortable level smoking abstinence reach . Patients complete brief interview 10-15 minute 2 week monthly month 1-5 .
